article_title: Study behind updated FDA guidance shows self-swab tests are as effective as those done by clinicians
article_description: Earlier this week  the U S  Food and Drug Administration  FDA  announced that it would be updating its guidance to allow self swab tests for COVID 19  in which a patient collects a sample for their own nose for a health professional to test  On Wednesday  Uni
